Package score.board.view

Class InputBox

java.lang.Object
score.board.view.InputBox
public class InputBox
extends java.lang.Object
InputBox is a combined componet which is used to collect input from the player.

InputBox collects player's name and saves its name and score to local file. InputBox contains a container VBox, a prompt Text, a TextField for inputing and a Button for submitting.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) javafx.scene.control.Button button
    The button for submitting the input.
    (package private) javafx.scene.text.Text text
    The prompt text for player.
    (package private) javafx.scene.control.TextField textFile
    The input text field for player to input.
    (package private) javafx.scene.layout.VBox vBox
    The root container for Text, TextField and Button.

  • Constructor Details

    • InputBox

      public InputBox​(java.lang.String title)
      Creates a VBox, a Text, a TextField and a Button and add them to the VBox.

      The text in Text is title and the text in Button is "Confirm".

      Parameters:
      title - the title of InputBox
